author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the mango in a bowl and toss with the chilli and sugar. Transfer to a small baking tray and roast for 10 minutes. To serve, place in a warm bowl and drizzle with the cream.
